features: High Quality Aluminum Anti-Rust 4 Part 55 Inch Handle, Lightweight broom with slanted side bristles produced from high quality 100% natural rubber guaranteed to last for long years
Uniquely designed slanted bristles 15 Inch long makes it perfect for cleaning along walls and household furniture without hassles
Sucks up dust, pet hair and removes other low weight dirt from vinyl, hardwood, carpet, cement, tiles and other surfaces within the home
Durable and Fully Washable rubber broom with detachable broom head and Soft rubber bristles that cleans effectively without scratching floors or furniture
100% natural rubber broom that is suitable for cleaning any delicate surface in or outside your home without absorbing dust or Hair.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ravmag has been designing, revolutionary cleaning tools, for households and businesses since 1987. We only use high-quality, long-lasting, material. Ravmag Lightweight Rubber Broom cleans floors more effectively in less time and with less effort. The angled rubber bristles gather even the smallest dust and debris particles on smooth surfaces, along walls, and in tight corners.The all-rubber construction is extremely durable but will not scratch or damage furniture. The extra-long, heavy-duty wand allows for more thorough cleaning in difficult-to-reach locations both indoors and out.

This premium Rubber Broom has a collection of uniquely designed bristles that provide amazing cleaning and dirt removal benefits. The angled bristles are manufactured from a single cast of high-quality rubber. The texture of the bristles assists in the formation of static charge, allowing the bristles to easily and conveniently suck up dust, pet fur, human hair, and other low-weight dirt from all solid surfaces The rubber broom not only picks up loose dirt, but it can also pull incredible amounts of hair and fur that the vacuum cleaner leaves behind, such as pet hair, human hair, sewing threads, and so on. Using short strokes, you create a static charge that not only lifts dirt and hair from the carpet but also prevents it from flying through the air. Quickly remove pet hair from high traffic areas and where your dog or cat likes to sleep. Because of the lightweight construction, this broom is particularly easy to grip and use for lengthy cleaning sessions. The high-quality design incorporates an extra-long handle with rubber bristles that can be used to remove hair, lint, dust, and grime off clothing, upholstery, and carpets, unlike other brooms. The long handle also makes it easy to clean ceilings, roofs, and other hard-to-reach surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light work of a mess
reviews.reviewText: My son spilled an entire five pound bag of sugar in the kitchen floor about a week ago and of course my vacuum was on the fritz 🤦🏼‍♀️ I got this out dreading my job but was surprised to find that this really does an amazing job. The handle is very easy to connect to the rubber broom part so didn’t take long to have it ready to go. It’s sturdy and durable. The size of the bristles are pretty good and don’t just “comb” through the mess it actually gets it all on one try. Definitely telling all my housewife friends about this one. Great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick assembly, did the job
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for something to scrub a metal floor in our food truck, and this did the trick. Slap down some soapy water and go to town. The little teeth get into the cracks. I also found that running this over the carpet does a great job picking up cat hair. Not sure if that is what it was designed for, but whatever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for salons!
reviews.reviewText: One of the best brooms we've ever had for sweeping hair. Nice and wide, and easy to keep clean. Also, super price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really gets all my cat's hair .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for pet hair
reviews.reviewText: I got this too try to give myself an edge in the battle against shedding hairs in my home. I have a German Shepherd who sheds practically all year long and I often find little tumbleweeds of hair just floating around the house, cotton corners and under tables. The worst fit is when it gets caught into the rugs and carpeting and the static makes it so hard to brush away with a standard broom. With this silicone bristle room, though, I'm able to Bunch up the hairs and collect them in neat little balls and strips and pick them up to throw away. It's also great for scrubbing away Light stains or spills that have caked on to the floor from food or juice that I missed before. The width of the broom and allows me to get a much wider area and Tackle so much more space at one time. Assembly of the handle allows you to adjust the length at will to make this go from a handheld to a standard length broom when you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Useless on carpet
reviews.reviewText: Bristles were soft & floppy, not nearly firm enough to get pet hairs off of carpet. It might work on a harder surface, but I doubt it.The handle and head were threaded, but didn't fit together and were so soft that you could just push the head onto the handle without turning.The handle was scraped and it had had a label on it prior to delivery that had been mostly scraped off. I suspect this was either a returned item or some kind of remainder or refurbished stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No better than a regular broom
reviews.reviewText: Who ever said this was like what was used in the stores and it picked up everything.... I'm not seeing it. The only advantage over my regular broom is that it can be cleaned. I figure it will be good for sweeping water off the court before play. Pet hair.... the hair floats around as you are sweeping, so a regular broom does a little better. Getting stuff into a dust pan is difficult --regular broom does better. Dust/fine particles -- good, but so is my broom; they do about the same. Rugs - it did work well on the floki rug as these are difficult to vacuum. I would not buy again as it doesn't do enough difference for the money. But if it meets a need, there's nothing inherently wrong with the item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wirks great on vinyl floors. Much better than standard brooms.
